name: Inazuma Eleven 2: Blizzard/FireStorm
description:
Inazuma Eleven 2: Blizzard/FireStorm is a sports-arcade game developed by Level 5. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Nintendo. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Inazuma Eleven 2: Blizzard/FireStorm is available on Nintendo DS.
